sounding 0.0.4101
  • Reference

Generic function for calculating thermo- and kinematic indices derived from atmospheric profiling.

Source: R/RcppExports.R
sounding_default.Rd

Generic function for calculating thermo- and kinematic indices derived from atmospheric profiling.

sounding_default(
  pressure,
  altitude,
  temperature,
  dew,
  angle,
  velocity,
  export_profile,
  accuracy
)

Arguments

pressure

pressure [hPa]
altitude

altitude [meters above surface]
temperature

air temperature [degree Celsius]
dew

dew point temperature [degree Celsius]
angle

wind direction [degrees]
velocity

wind speed [metres per second]
export_profile

runtime parameters

Examples

pressure <- c(1000, 855, 700, 500, 300, 100, 10)
altitude <- c(0, 1500, 2500, 6000, 8500, 12000, 25000)
temp <- c(25, 10, 0, -15, -30, -50, -92)
dpt <- c(20, 5, -5, -30, -55, -80, -99)
wd <- c(0, 90, 135, 180, 270, 350, 0)
ws <- c(5, 10, 20, 30, 40, 5, 0)
sounding(pressure, altitude, temp, dpt, wd, ws)
